```py
SELECT team,
       AVG(weight) AS average_player_weight
FROM olympics_athletes_events
WHERE sport = 'Judo'
  AND medal IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY team
HAVING MIN(age) >= 20
AND MAX(age) <= 30;
```

```py
SELECT dept_name,
       COUNT(student_id) AS student_number
FROM department
LEFT JOIN student ON department.dept_id = student.dept_id
GROUP BY department.dept_name
ORDER BY student_number DESC,
         department.dept_name;
```

```py
SELECT h.hacker_id,
       h.name,
       SUM(max_score) AS sum_max_score
FROM hackers h
JOIN
  (SELECT hacker_id,
          challenge_id,
          MAX(score) AS max_score
   FROM submissions
   GROUP BY hacker_id,
            challenge_id) s ON h.hacker_id = s.hacker_id
GROUP BY h.name,
         h.hacker_id
HAVING SUM(max_score) > 0
ORDER BY SUM(max_score) DESC, h.hacker_id;
```
